You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you find yourself inside Mount Nevermind, home of the gnomes. You see an old gnome handing out novice building tasks to visitors. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
